sentences.en: ...a University professor who specializes in the history of the Russian empire.
sentences.cn: …一位专门研究沙俄历史的大学教授。

sentences.en: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.cn: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.en: "You must specialize, " he says.
sentences.cn: “你必须做到专门化。” 他说。

sentences.en: He decided to specialize in entomology after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他决定毕业后专攻昆虫学.

sentences.en: I have decided to specialize in plant chemicals that can be used for insecticides.
sentences.cn: 我已经下决心专门研究可以用作杀虫剂的植物中的化学物质.

sentences.en: I'll have to ask you to examine the account and specialize each item.
sentences.cn: 我得请你检查一下账目逐项详列.

sentences.en: Man invented writing to specialize, i . e . preserve language.
sentences.cn: 人类发明了文字,才能给予语言以形态, 也就是说,才能把语言保存下来.

sentences.en: Many libraries specialize in genealogy.
sentences.cn: 许多图书馆专门收藏氏族家谱.

sentences.en: Many students specialize in engineering.
sentences.cn: 许多学生专攻工程学.

sentences.en: Most of the employment agencies specialize in some particular kind of work.
sentences.cn: 职业介绍所大多专门介绍某一种特殊工作.

sentences.en: Most students do not expect to specialize in economics.
sentences.cn: 大多数学生并不想把经济学作为专业.

sentences.en: Or it may be made up solely of analysts who specialize in requirements gathering and use case development.
sentences.cn: 或者，这个团队可以仅由那些专门进行需求收集和用例开发的分析人员组成。

sentences.en: Others specialize in carving wooden chains or a " ball in cage " from one piece of wood.
sentences.cn: 另一些人擅长把一块木头刻成木链或 “ 笼中球 ”.

sentences.en: Rules govern how to specialize safely: Each new information type must map to an existing one, and new information types must be more restrictive than the existing one in the content that they allow.
sentences.cn: 规则可以监管如何安全地专门化：每一新信息类型必须映射到现有的一种类型，而且新信息类型必须比它们所允许的内容中现成的更加有限制性。

sentences.en: Simmons specialized in contract law.
sentences.cn: 西蒙斯专攻合同法。

sentences.en: Some only provide funds or specialize in technical support.
sentences.cn: 一些组织只提供资金或专门的技术支持。

sentences.en: Students specialize in a particular type of practical joke: the hoax.
sentences.cn: 学生们擅长于一种特殊形式的恶作剧 -- 设置骗局.

sentences.en: The bakers specialize in catering for large parties.
sentences.cn: 那些面包师专门负责为大型宴会提供食品.

sentences.en: The large hotel chains employ architects and interior decorators who specialize in hotel work.
sentences.cn: 大型旅馆连锁聘有对旅馆业务有专门知识的建筑师和内部装璜师.

sentences.en: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.cn: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

sentences.en: There are restaurants, both humble and expensive, that specialize in them.
sentences.cn: 专门做这些菜的餐馆既有毫不起眼的也有价格昂贵的。

sentences.en: They cannot afford to specialize on its food.
sentences.cn: 它们不能把自己的食物局限于某一种类.

sentences.en: We specialize in glass making.
sentences.cn: 我们专门从事制造玻璃.
